Package service

Class ReplenishmentRequestService

java.lang.Object
service.ReplenishmentRequestService
public class ReplenishmentRequestService extends Object
The ReplenishmentRequestService class provides functionality for managing replenishment requests for medicines, including creation, status updates, and retrieval of requests.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Russell Arvin

  • Constructor Details

    • ReplenishmentRequestService

      public ReplenishmentRequestService(ReplenishmentRequestRepository replenishmentRequestRepository, MedicineRepository medicineRepository, PharmacistRepository pharmacistRepository)
      Constructs a ReplenishmentRequestService with the required repositories.
      Parameters:
      replenishmentRequestRepository - Repository for managing replenishment requests.
      medicineRepository - Repository for managing medicine data.
      pharmacistRepository - Repository for managing pharmacist data.

  • Method Details

    • getMedicineId

      public String getMedicineId(String medicineName)
      Retrieves the ID of a medicine based on its name.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine.
      Returns:
      The ID of the medicine, or null if not found.

    • createRequest

      public String createRequest(String medicineId, String pharmacistId, int newAmount)
      Creates a new replenishment request for a medicine.
      Parameters:
      medicineId - The ID of the medicine.
      pharmacistId - The ID of the pharmacist making the request.
      newAmount - The amount to be replenished.
      Returns:
      null if successful, or an error message if creation fails.

    • updateRequestStatus

      public String updateRequestStatus(String requestId, ReplenishmentRequestStatus status)
      Updates the status of a replenishment request.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The ID of the replenishment request.
      status - The new status to set for the request.
      Returns:
      null if successful, or an error message if the update fails.

    • getRequests

      public ReplenishmentRequestDetail[] getRequests()
      Retrieves all pending replenishment requests with their details.
      Returns:
      An array of ReplenishmentRequestDetail objects.

    • getPharmacistRequests

      public ReplenishmentRequestDetail[] getPharmacistRequests(String pharmacistID)
      Retrieves all replenishment requests made by a specific pharmacist with their details.
      Parameters:
      pharmacistID - The ID of the pharmacist.
      Returns:
      An array of ReplenishmentRequestDetail objects for the pharmacist.
